"Brigitta":
"These must be those imitations I've been hearing about.
Those are elite ARKS, aren't they...? This could be an issue."

"Fortunately, we should be able to move on as long as we defeat the Darkers. Whether we fight the imitations or not...
I leave that decision to you."
